channel.title: Blog on huban's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on huban's Blog

item.title: Happy Birthday to huban
item.description: Today is huban’s birthday. We prepared cream cake (huban can eat one) to celebrate his birthday. Our boy is three years old and is a big cat. Thank you so much to huban for being with us for three years, during which he has become closer and closer to us and regards us as his main companions. We wish our boy a healthy and happy growth. We will continue to watch over each other in the future.
